title: Rowing: a symphony of motion
creator_credit: Jerry Murphy, Trin Yarborough and Docufilms
brief_description: Surveys the different varieties of rowing from the grace and solitude of the single oarsman to the drive and precision of an eight-oar crew - a parallel of fragile beauty and driving power. Also includes a segment on women in rowing.
description: Surveys the different varieties of rowing from the grace and solitude of the single oarsman to the drive and precision of an eight-oar crew - a parallel of fragile beauty and driving power. Also includes a segment on women in rowing.
